attributes.action: Call a general Election before the end of 2009 but at the earliest point possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has let the people of great britian down by feeling they can say sorry for abusing the expenses system and at points criminaly stealing money that has been work for by the british public.
Saying sorry is not enough people need too be brought to account as is the way for the rest of the population of the united kingdom.
Do the right thing let us decide

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
